tool_description:
Don't hesitate to contact me on Telegram @AlexanderVikhorev or via email alexander.xbx@gmail.com :)
Powerfull API for scraping via different proxies, making a screenshot of a website or getting an HTML of a JS rendered page.
name: Scraper.Tech
title: Scraper.Tech

api_list.name: JS Rendered Page
api_list.description: You can use this methos if you need to get final HTML of the page with lots of JS rendered elements
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scraper-tech.p.rapidapi.com/fullpage.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scraper-tech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://scraper-tech.p.rapidapi.com/fullpage.php"

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Website Screenshot
api_list.description:
Here an example how to get a screenshot with my scraping api.

Available parameters:
**url** - is a webpage that you want to get a screenshot of
**screen_size** - Browser window size(screenshot's image size), Default: 1920x1080

api_list.name: POST/GET Request
api_list.description: Here is a simple request to parse a web page.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scraper-tech.p.rapidapi.com/get.php"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scraper-tech.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
